resources.string:
This app will listen on port $port on localhost for new requests. 
Every new request will create a BroadcastIntent with the action 'de.c11k.httpserver.message.$path'.

So if you request http://127.0.0.1:$port/foobar the intents action will be 'de.c11k.httpserver.message.foobar'. You can then use this in tasker 'Event -> Intent Received' to run a task.
